title: Nationwide Selects AWS And Amazon Connect To Personalise CX For 17 Million Members
summary: Nationwide has chosen AWS and Amazon Connect to enhance the customer experience for its 17 million members. The new AWS agreement will leverage Amazon Connect, AI tooling, and faster delivery to improve Nationwide's member experience. The move is part of Nationwide's strategy to personalize its customer service.
hook: Nationwide leverages AWS and Amazon Connect to personalize CX for 17M members!

title: Customer experience management
summary: The article discusses the impact of AI on customer experience management, including its role in visual search and enterprise collaboration. It also highlights the rise of remote work leading to innovations in field service management. E-commerce professionals and CX leaders are advised to adopt visual search strategies to enhance online product visibility and customer engagement.
hook: AI reshaping customer experience and service management in the remote work era.

title: Customer service and contact center
summary: The article discusses the impact of AI on enterprise workflows, particularly in customer service. It highlights the rise of remote work and the subsequent innovations in field service management. However, it notes that ownership and accountability are not keeping pace with the rapid advancements.
hook: AI is reshaping customer service, but accountability lags behind.

title: The quiet shift that made AI unavoidable
summary: The article discusses the subtle but significant shift in AI adoption, where AI is increasingly integrated into tools that organizations already use, changing behavior and operations without being explicitly acknowledged as a strategic choice. It suggests that AI has become an unavoidable part of modern business practices. However, the article does not provide specific examples or mention any particular companies or sectors.
hook: AI is subtly changing business operations, becoming an unavoidable reality.

title: Trends and Innovation
summary: The article is a sponsored content by IT vendors, focusing on how to increase employee satisfaction through easy access to HR services using ServiceNow solutions. It also discusses the delivery of modern workflows, apps, and automation at scale with a single hyperautomation platform. However, it does not directly relate to the Contact Center / CCaaS / CX space.
hook: Boost employee satisfaction with ServiceNow's hyperautomation platform!

title: Meet Your Business Goals by Transforming IT Service Operations
summary: The article discusses the challenges of implementing cloud-first initiatives and AI while using legacy tools and dealing with disparate silos. It suggests that traditional IT approaches are insufficient in today's business environment. The article promotes ServiceNow ServiceOps solutions as a way to overcome these challenges.
hook: Legacy tools hindering your cloud-first initiatives? Try ServiceNow ServiceOps solutions.
